vote.title: An ordinance abandoning a portion of two slope easements to Shelter Ministries of Dallas, the abutting owner, containing a total of approximately 3,942 square feet of land, located near the intersection of Production and Lucas Drives -  Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($26,812.00) and General Fund ($20,000.00), plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
